title: The Eden Covenant: Book 3
description: When Ellie Carver receives a vision of things to come, she takes it to heart, gathering her family, leaning on her faith, and preparing for the worst. There's just one problem; her son and his family are stuck in Nevada, blocked by military at the Oregon border, and they have a small window of opportunity to find them and bring them safely to the family home in Idaho. As the crisis across the nation worsens, Ellie and her family struggle to ensure that their home is ready to take in many of their family and friends as Ellie leads a charge that draws together neighbors in service, attracts new friends, and even love for one of her sisters. If you are a believer in scriptural prophesy of the last days, you won't want to miss this riveting novel by noted author MaryAnn Ball as she combines faith and fact into a colorful tale that will leave you wanting more. For more information visit the book site at www.EdenCovenant.com
author: MaryAnn Ball
